body:
someone should translate the missing chapters from the Nikki series. 
They skipped translation from 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23, straight to 24 :(

Whyyyyy why does the author has to go back to Hikaru again?

@unonymous:to my understanding, the Nikki series started after the ending of Play series. So the reading order should be Play -> Play Kan (alternate route of Play? idk) -> Nikki
@Glaugan: Guys ugly and old for a reason. This series has a little ntr in it and also it supposed to shown how shamefull the things the girls does in this.
What’s the reading order for valssu‘s series? Like, what happened to the little bro character who was her look out? The release was so confusing.

This illustrator must really brush up his/her skill at drawing guys faces, they look as shitty and generic as they come.
I know that's not the reason anyone would click this, but good lord this is as bad as big fat ugly bastards!
